item.description:
Spring Back to the 80’s
Featuring Seasonal Beer Offerings that help us welcome Spring


Sponsored By:


Magic Hat Brewing Company


Get teleported back into the 1980’s!
The years where MTV ruled the minds of like all people on Earth!
And like the music was way rad!

Oh my God! It’s gonna be like the best night ever, for sure!

Saturday, May 30, 2009
6:30 pm until Midnight
Crowne Plaza in Nashua, NH

Enjoy a night of dancing to all your favorites tunes from the 80’s!


An appetizer buffet, with plenty of both hot and cold appetizers through out the night!
Nothing that will make you wanna barf or get like gagged with a spoon!

Play 80's Trivia against others!


Totally win the wicked awesome grand prize for best 80’s outfit!

Enjoy 80’s Slide Show presentation!

Rub elbows with figures from the 80’s

Enter the Break Dancing Contest!
Cardboard provided!

Souvenir Photos, Way Excellent Door Prizes, Raffles, and more!

Not a child of the 80’s? Don’t worry! Take a chill pill. You'll be rad soon enough, for sure. Just don’t miss out! Still don’t think it will be fun? As if! What-ever!

To purchase tickets goto www.BeerEncounters.com

A very limited number of tickets will be available at the door.
(You must be 21 or older to attend this event)

Don't Drink and Drive! Take advantage of our special $99 hotel room rate!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: SPRING BACK TO THE 80'S
